issue.body:
This reverts commit cf06398587da23ac530b03a941e0efe6cf29aef7 and adds a new test to prevent further regression.

Fixes #3314, reopens #3043.

body: The related change has been reverted in #3318 and the topic should be evaluated again together with #1652 and #2519.
@scordio apologies for https://github.com/assertj/assertj/issues/3314 and thank you for the quick revert.
No problem at all, @findepi! Unfortunately, we missed that potential breaking change but now we learned üôÇ
